title: Scripting graphical applications by demonstration
proctitle: CHI '98: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Brad A. Myers
authors.institution: Human Computer Interaction Institute, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA
